item.description:
Mila Jovovich returns to F stuff up as Alice, in the latest installment of this successful franchise.

From Fandango.com:

Alice fights alongside a resistance movement in the continuing battle against the Umbrella Corporation and the undead.

 

THAT'S WHAT I JUST SAID!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We'll be seeing the 7pm, NON-3D digital showing. I'll arrive at 6pm to shepherd you lambs, and we'll head in around 6:30pm to get good seats. GET TICKETS EARLY.

If you want to join us for dinner afterwards, please, BRING CASH to make everything easier and faster when time to render unto Caesar.

SEE YA!
item.how_to_find_us: If downstairs, I'll be by the ropes, nearer concessions; if upstairs, we'll be occupying a table near the windows, hoarding all the loud, annoying chairs.
item.name: Resident Evil: Retribution
